entry.title: TIMBER TRUCKERS LIGHT PARADE IS SATURDAY NIGHT
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 4:40 a.m. The 30th annual Timber Truckers Light Parade is happening this Saturday night. entry.title: Woman found guilty for multiple animal negligences
entry.summary: Kendra Faye Larson, 29, was sentenced to 200 days of work crew Tuesday for animal neglect of multiple dogs. Per statute, she cannot own any domestic animals for 15 years.

entry.title: ROSEBURG HITS 67 DEGREES TUESDAY – RECORD FOR THE DATE
entry.summary: December 6, 2023 4:20 a.m. Roseburg had a record high temperature for the date on Tuesday. Data from the National Weather Service said the mercury reached 67 degrees at the Roseburg Regional Airport. The previous record for December 5th was 61 degrees, set in 2015. The record propelled Tuesday to now being the 6th warmest...
